entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Rosthern
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:25 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saskatoon Diefenbaker Int'l Airport 07:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -14.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -17.2°C
Wind: NE 28 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
